repositories.name: X-Road
repositories.description: Source code of the X-Road¬Æ data exchange layer software

issues.title: As a Security Specialist I want to study what open source tools could be used for automating X-Road security testing so that I know which tools are best suited for X-Road

As a Product Owner I want that the memory allocated for Proxy component will be automatically adjusted at init phase of Security Server to correlate the amount of RAM memory to optimize the performance
As a Developer I want to change the Security Server installation so that the JNA library is installed to /usr/share/xroad/lib so that it wouldn't cause problems for users
As a Developer I want to analyse the Security Server proxy performance to find bottlenecks in the current code
As a product owner I want that message timestamping is refactored, so that it is more robust
As a Security Server Administrator I want the SO_LINGER timeout properties to work as they're documented so that I can configure socket closing behaviour based on my needs
As a Security Server user I want that X-Road metaservice codes are reserved so that the user can't overload them
As a Developer I want that Ansible scripts support deployment of Icelandic Security Server so that it's automatized
As a X-Road user I want that xroad-signer is profiled and possible bottlenecks are documented
As a Security Server Administrator I would like the Security Server to not return the Jetty version that is used so that automated scanners can't use it to discover a vulnerable version
